OK to discard the changes and select the other NIC?

'IP Address' is required and must contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Subnet Mask' is required and must contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Default Gateway' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Primary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Secondary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Primary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
'Secondary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.

It is highly recommended that the PAC be rebooted to finalize changes made to the Network Settings.

Click 'Yes' to reboot the PAC now or click 'No' if you prefer to reboot it later...
